changesets.comments: cgame: enable hitsounds by default, refs #300
cgame: set default fov value to 106.27 for 16:9 screens, refs #300

Revert "cgame: set default fov value to 106.27 for 16:9 screens, refs #300"

This reverts commit 0b193eed3b55b2e6279261b1dddac5261574ced7.

journals.notes:

Are you still using 2.60b? If not, I recommend you let ET:L recreate the config, because there are tons of obsolete cvars in that config. I removed some of them plus Silent mod cvars and changed a couple of things. The remaining unchecked cvars are marked with ">" 
seta r_mode "-2" // default to desktop resolution
seta r_depthbits "24"
seta r_stencilbits "0"
seta r_stereoEnabled "0"
seta r_colorbits "0"
seta r_texturebits "0"
seta r_ext_texture_env_add "1"
seta r_ext_texture_filter_anisotropic "0" // Why 0?
seta r_ext_compiled_vertex_array "1"
seta r_ext_multitexture "1"
seta r_ext_compressed_textures "1"
seta r_allowExtensions "1"
seta joy_threshold "0.15"

seta in_joystick "0"
seta in_mouse "1"
seta cg_zoomstepsniper "2"

seta sensitivity "2.4"

seta rate "50000"
seta pmove_msec "8"

subject: Tweak default client config
description:
This is a very important thing in my eyes. It would be great if the default cfg that is bundled with installer was "newbie friendly" as default config is terrible IMO, especially for newbies who dunno much about cvars and stuff (there aren't many new players unfortunately).

For me the biggest issues are:
1. It is too dark by default (even Oasis doesn't look like an Nothern African map in noon time)
2. The weap viewmodel take almost half of the screen, small FoV increase (let's say to 100) would be appreciated.
3. Blood HUD splash, bob things etc. are not any useful to play better.
4. ... more to add
